Class SavingsAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • BankAccount
      • SavingsAccount
  • public class SavingsAccount
extends BankAccount
    A savings account that earns interest and requires a positive balance.

    Savings accounts do not allow overdrafts - withdrawals are only permitted if sufficient balance exists. Each account has a configurable interest rate that is applied independently of the central bank's default rate.

    Key features:

    • No overdraft protection - balance must remain positive
    • Account-specific interest rate
    • Suitable for saving money and earning interest
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    BankSystem Team
    See Also:
    BankAccount, CheckingAccount

      • SavingsAccount

        public SavingsAccount​(java.lang.String id,
                      java.lang.String owner,
                      double interestRate)
        Creates a savings account with a custom interest rate.
        Parameters:
        id - unique account identifier
        owner - name of the account owner
        interestRate - annual interest rate (must be between 0.0 and 1.0)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if interest rate is not between 0 and 1

    • Method Detail

      • getInterestRate

        public double getInterestRate()
        Returns the interest rate for this savings account.
        Returns:
        the annual interest rate (between 0.0 and 1.0)

      • applyInterest

        public void applyInterest()
                   throws AccountStatusException
        Applies interest to this account using the account-specific rate.

        Overrides the parent method to use this account's interest rate instead of the central bank's default rate.

        Overrides:
        applyInterest in class BankAccount
        Throws:
        AccountStatusException - if the account is not active

      • withdraw

        public void withdraw​(double amount)
              throws InsufficientFundsException,
                     InvalidAmountException,
                     AccountStatusException
        Withdraws money from the account.

        Withdrawals are only allowed if sufficient balance exists. Overdrafts are not permitted.

        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to withdraw (must be positive)
        Throws:
        InsufficientFundsException - if balance is insufficient
        InvalidAmountException - if amount is zero or negative
        AccountStatusException
